game.name: The Last Fighter
game.shortDescription: You are a lone fighter who was thrown into the jungle. Defeat pirates, smugglers and bandits, get out of the dangerous jungle alive!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are a lone fighter who was thrown into the jungle. Defeat pirates, smugglers and bandits, get out of the dangerous jungle alive!

reviewHighlights.text: The Last Uninstall Button. Another unpolished game engine template shovelware from Laush Studio. Shitty graphics. Godawful music. No graphical options...
[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote] The Last Fighter is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake ga...
